Description: Carnelian scarab; hole drilled longitudinally; engraved lines demarking elytra, head and legs; base plain; polished.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 292)
Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (No. 64)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P44, Pl XI)
